summary: This appears to be a confidential law enforcement log and daily activities report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 21, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death. It is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case files.

events.title: Daily Activities at Metropolitan Correctional Center
events.description: Routine log and activities report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was being held.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center
locations.context: Federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.

keyFacts: The document is a confidential lieutenant's log and daily activities report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It is dated July 21, 2019, which is the day before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019 (Note: actual death date was August 10, 2019; this log is from weeks prior).
The document is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case files related to the Epstein investigation.
The report originates from the Bureau of Prisons facility where Epstein was held pending trial.
The document reference 'SDNY_00010365' and 'EFTA00139490' indicates it is an official record within the Epstein case document set.
